channel.title: Shots fired at Capitol Hill
channel.description:
http://blog.al.com/wire/2013/10/report_of_shots_fired_at_capit.html
So apparently shots have been fired just now. This is going to be horrible for everybody ugh.. I mean firearm rights and all jeez gg everyone.
I would post this in the news thread but it's locked so...

item.title: Shots fired at Capitol Hill
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:8, topic:533639”]waiting for the official fox news report before i trust anything[/quote]HAHAHAHAHA, ahhh…

[quote=“Jmood, post:20, topic:533639”]I love how everyone thinks the government is going to take your guns away. :P[/quote]There’s going to be a fight before that happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Shots fired at Capitol Hill
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:22, topic:533639”][quote author=Bowser jr link=topic=652429.msg4371751#msg4371751 date=1380847623]

I own a Keltec KSG 12 GA Shotgun, an AK-47, Keltec P32, Keltec PMR-30. I don’t keep them locked up but I do keep them in a safe place. My PMR-30 is always by my side (except in public.) There is no way possible for the government to take our guns.

Drones, missiles, helicopters, fighter planes, mortars. They have a lot of choices when it comes to defeating you and your petty weapons.
[/quote]Yeah like our own government is going to launch missiles or drones on it’s people. That wouldn’t be a pretty turn.[/quote]
Yeah, like our government is attempting to steal our firearms…?

Get on topic, jesus christ. Nothing was mentioned about this being a firearm debate; get the fuck over it and stay on topic.

Read full topic

I own a Keltec KSG 12 GA Shotgun, an AK-47, Keltec P32, Keltec PMR-30. I don’t keep them locked up but I do keep them in a safe place. My PMR-30 is always by my side (except in public.) There is no way possible for the government to take our guns.
[/quote]
Drones, missiles, helicopters, fighter planes, mortars. They have a lot of choices when it comes to defeating you and your petty weapons.[/quote]Yeah like our own government is going to launch missiles or drones on it’s people. That wouldn’t be a pretty turn.

item.title: Shots fired at Capitol Hill
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Thanks, Obama

Really though, how did this even become a gun debate? It’s not even related. This isn’t a civilian using his firearms; it’s not “Oh shit a civilian shot a congressman, let’s strip all civilians of their firearms.” at all, so how did this even become that debate?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:15, topic:533639”][quote author=Travas link=topic=652429.msg4371744#msg4371744 date=1380846340]

waiting for the official fox news report before i trust anything
[/quote]fox news was one of the first to report on it
[/quote]I don’t think you quite understand what he was saying.
[/quote]I must not be… fox news is a news place out here… it’s actually where I originally heard about it.[/quote]Fox news is just about the worst place you can go to find news. They are always biased and tend to change stories a lot. You’re probably going to disagree with me on this, but it’s the truth. Although, I will admit, they are fast reporters (which is probably the reason why their news is garbage).
